name: Brittaineay Moore
text: Just absolutely WOW! Tonight was our first time and definitely will not be our last! This place was awesome and the atmosphere was pretty chill and fun to observe! A man was singing live,and the staff was very friendly! The food was worth the wait,which was rather quicker than expected being it was pretty packed on a Friday at 630pm. The burgers was juicy,thick and the most delicious burgers by far,compared to any other burger I've ever tasted! This place it in a neighborhood, but it was easy to located and definitely worth giving it a shot,you definitely Will Not regret checking it out! Loved it and will be back again!!!

name: Spencer Plasse
text: Easily one of the best burgers you can find in Mobile. The chips are fantastic as well (they’re the equivalent of fries here). The environment is unique - fairly laid back but lively when busy. I recommend visiting when they have a band playing for a truly great experience!

name: Jeremy tooley
text: The Ruben sandwich was the best I've had in a long time. The food and atmosphere is always great.

name: Captain Bill
text: What else could you ask for. Irish pub off the beaten path with great food and the perfect atmosphere to enjoy a Reuben on rye and a cold draft beer.

name: David Gray
text: Just what we needed. Pure local bliss. This is why we love this area.

name: Chris Anders
text: Loved it. In from Denver and we went there 3 times! Excellent food and staff. The bread pudding is to die for!

name: Wade Halstead
text: This place is always spot-on. Definitely elevated sandwiches, with a good sprinkling of specials. Great draft beer selections, too.

name: Emily Hartsell
text: Try the house made chips! I've really enjoyed the Bloody Mary, burgers, and a BLT as well. They've got friendly service, good drinks, and tasty food. What more could you ask for? As a bonus, it's easy to find parking nearby.

name: Flynn Skyler
text: Callaghan's is a staple in the Oakleigh Garden District. The staff is always nice and friendly. They serve the best cocktails and they have a large variety of local beers to enjoy. I absolutely love their burgers. In my opinion Callaghan's has the best burger in Mobile. The Irish Dip is soooo delicious and a must try. overall is good

name: Stephen Jones
text: Excellent food, the staff is friendly and the atmosphere is great! Easy place for a quick meal or to hang out with a group of friends.

name: David Vial
text: Great Burgers, Reuben on Rye. & the best Bread Pudding with Whiskey Sauce and powdered sugar..Atmosphere fine. Lots of old McGill Baseball, football pics. Also Murphy.

name: A Lizard
text: Everyone was nice. The water was also good.

name: Steve Dearing
text: Really neat community restaurant and pub located in the neighborhood. Good food. Good service. I wish we had something like this back home.

name: Sue P
text: Great burgers, good live music, & a pleasant crowd.

name: Alec Bauman
text: Everything is fresh and of great quality. The spinach artichoke dip is amazing. Highly recommend this place

name: Chris Humpal
text: Always a good decision to come to Callaghan's. Best draft Guinness in town. Best cheeseburger in the country. Staff is always friendly, even when they are slammed. Been coming here for 10+ years. Great Sunday brunch, but come early.

name: Jeannie Lanzillo
text: Fantastic burgers! Guinness on draft! Friendly neighborhood bar

name: M Kilgore
text: Friendly, fun loving atmosphere!  Great food and music!  Love the neighborhood location!

name: Brian Cobb
text: Locals know it well. Great relaxing environment. Constant live music. Fun for a beer or dinner. The food is outstanding. Burgers are a must have but the sandwich options are unbeatable too.

name: Chris Humpal
text: Always a good decision to come to Callaghan's. Best draft Guinness in town. Best cheeseburger in the country. Staff is always friendly, even when they are slammed. Been coming here for 10+ years. Great Sunday brunch, but come early.

name: M Kilgore
text: Friendly, fun loving atmosphere!  Great food and music!  Love the neighborhood location!

name: Jeannie Lanzillo
text: Fantastic burgers! Guinness on draft! Friendly neighborhood bar

name: Sue P
text: Great burgers, good live music, & a pleasant crowd.

name: Amantha Johnson
text: A piece of Irish history, fabulous cheeseburgers, and a huge selection of beers on tap... what's not to love?

name: Eric Schmidt
text: Excellent food, excellent service. Off the beaten path, but a great, local favorite (recommended by numerous locals we talked to while walking). Highly recommended!

name: Teri Odell
text: Fun, friendly atmosphere. Excellent staff! Great music! 😊

name: Paul LePiane
text: A few well chosen beers on draft. The hamburgers are fantastic, patties are not processed packed hard, the cucumber and tomato salad made daily is wonderful.

name: Kent E Beck, Jr.
text: Good food, great selection of beers and excellent service.

name: Judi Gonzalez
text:
After making my rounds, I've settled on my favorite burger in Mobile! While there are great contenders, the current title goes to Callaghan's hands down!

The burgers are juicy and firing on all cylinders! I like ordering mine "Trevin style" as his way works! Medium cook, with bacon, all the fixings, and pepper jack cheese!Trevin has been our server twice now, and both times he's been the "host with the most" and took great care of us.

We've also enjoyed the bands on our visits. Callaghan's is the "neighborhood watering hole" epitomized, and one of Mobile's best dives with great food!

name: Jim Thomson
text: Great food and outstanding service. Ask for Whitney

name: James Duke
text:
The closest you're going to get to a local pub in Mobile, AL. The burger is one of the best you'll find in the area as well. They can get pretty busy and parking can be a pain, but once you've had a drink and the food, you'll know it was worth it. It is in the middle of a mid-town neighborhood, so don't think the gps is leading you wrong. (Be sure to ask for fries, 🤭)
If you found this review helpful, hit the like button.

name: Lyn Baldwin
text: Terrific hamburgers and Ruben sandwich!! A fun pub in old Mobile!!

name: Terry G
text: Great food and drink. Fun stop in Mobile, plus the yardi-gras!

name: Sunshiney One
text: Food was better than EXCELLENT. This was my first trip and I was quite surprised. I've recommended Callaghan's to everyone I know since I went. The burger was better than any place else I've had one in town. I've had lots of burgers too.

name: Robert Walden
text: I cannot day enough good things about Callahans! We called on a Saturday evening trying to find space for a large group. Everyone was full, including Callahans. Just a few minutes after speaking with the restaurant, they called us back and we were able to get the back room. Excellent service and food! I highly recommend the patty melt and philly cheese! Large selection of libations as well! We will be back in May when we return!

name: David E.
text: Burger is amazing. Can't go wrong. Love this place.

name: Charles Schenher
text: I like to Callahan's back in the 60s 70s an early 80s they're not the same anymore

name: Simona Ghersi Newell
text: Best burgers, best music and best atmosphere! I absolutely love it!

name: Kenneth Reilly
text: I've been going here for years and it's always great. The food is awesome and the atmosphere is as Irish as it gets on this side of the pond. If you're looking for a good time you will find it here. Sláinte!

name: Tamara Goodman
text: Coolest bar in Mobile that also has the #1 rated hamburger in town.  All of the food is outstanding.  They have a small kitchen and all of the food is fresh so you might have to wait a little for your food on occasion.  Don’t worry though.  It’s worth the wait.  Atmosphere is casual and relaxed.  Great place for getting the relaxed Mobile vibe.  The restaurant is very warm and welcoming of everyone.  Often there is live music.  It is always great entertainment.  I love this place!

name: Griffin Shreves
text: Sunday brunch cannot be beat.

name: Ralph Freeman
text: My boss decided to take our team out to lunch and chose Callaghan’s. I’m new to the area and read that this place had one of the best burgers in town. This is a classic local pub and looks like the real deal inside. I had the bacon double cheeseburger with chips fully dressed. I ordered it medium rare and when It arrived, it was slightly bloody which I found perfect. My burger and chips were delicious. I recommend Callaghan’s.

name: Turner Trading
text: Always good, glad they are still open through this covid b.s.

name: Latonika Scott
text: Great family friendly location to dine in or take out food! They have the best burgers ever❣

name: Dr L
text: Good food, good drinks, a place to kick back and enjoy adult friends and adult family.

name: Scott Hughes
text: Enjoyed the live music and the burger.

name: Harrison
text: Food was great and awesome atmosphere. Only issue was we had to wait about 2 hours for food.

name: Michael Knight
text: The conecuh burger is the absolute best burger you can find for 300 miles.

name: Drew Henson
text: Perfect burger as usual. Music was so loud it was hard to even order, much less have a conversation. I promise the band would have been just as good a many decibels less.

name: Cory Griffin
text: Great location one of the best Reubens I have had in a while! Staff was very friendly!

name: Paul A. Bennett
text: I have been to Callaghans quite a few times in my life and every time it is a pleasureable experience. I always have a Guinness and a Rueben sandwich. This evening I showed up about 30 minutes to closing time and I was greeted with a big smile and someone very happy to serve my needs. The Rueben  was very generous in the size department ans my beer was smooth and dark. Thanks Jenny and crew for the late night hospitality.

name: Jared Budlong
text: They have a delicious cheese burger and friendly staff.

name: Tracy Chadwell
text: Love this place. Always great food!

name: Jason Whiddon
text: Great atmosphere and food, whether it be for live music or just for lunch.

name: shandrel shessiar
text: Hidden gem of amazing food, atmosphere, live music,and great service! Will be a regular now!! Try the bread pudding it will surprise you!!

name: Chase Powell
text: Great place for food and friends.  Amazing atmosphere.

name: Wiley Blankenship
text: For out of towners this should be on your bucket list. This is a Mobile institution for music and great bar food.

name: Zack Davis
text: I love this place. It's a mobile staple. They have a large selection of both draft and canned beers and it rotates fairly regularly. The food is also good. I've enjoyed a shrimp poboy, a Philly cheese steak, and they have one of the best burgers in the city. They don't offer fries, but the chips are good enough that it doesn't matter. The drinks and the food are great, but the main attraction is always the atmosphere. There is live music just as often as not and cover is cheap or non existent. I recommend checking out a show as soon as you get the chance and they always support local artists.

name: Kevin Johnson
text: Had  their great burger and it lived up to the hype.  Neat little place

name: Sara Miller
text: This is the only restaurant in Mobile I visited that was good, clean and friendly. Burger lived up to its name. Great local vibe. Keep doing what you're doing. 😊

name: Melanie Willer
text: Neighborhood bar that doesn’t allow outsiders in. We tried to come with a group of 7 as new locals and they told us to sit upstairs (the upstairs is segregated and there was no large table available). Although there were parties of 3 and 4 occupying large tables we decided we’d compromise to splitting into 2 smaller parties in order to try it out. We were then quickly run off saying “it will be over an hour no matter what you order!!” So we chose to leave at that point... I do not recommend trying this place unless you are personal friends with the owner.

name: St
text: Great service, excellent food. Perfect sweet tea.

name: David Alday
text: Tons of fun. Cute neighborhood and friendly people. Best burger in town. Good prices.

name: Jacob Cumbaa
text: Great food and atmosphere.

name: Oreo Jumper Guinea Pigs
text: So...first time here.  Heard good things.  Place is literally in a neighborhood.  Very cool.   Say at bar.  Quickly had Guinness.   Next.   Bacon Cheeseburger and was out quick.   Look at the picture.   It’s worth a 1,000 words.   Having fun and eating up life.   Yall come and join me.  EDIT...STAY FOR THE BREAD PUDDING....

name: Josep I'll o Randelrtdi add iew Dr why we will rfyi
text: Excellent music and food!

name: mopar maniac
text: Nice Irish pub with the best cheeseburger and philly cheesesandwich of the world

name: clayton nicholson
text: Great lunch place!

name: Tracy LePiane
text: Small hole in the wall. Great food, service, and atmosphere

name: Wesley Stokes
text: Not your typical Irish Club.  It has a nostalgic atmosphere, and the food, albeit limited selection, is great.  Definitely would recommend for a person looking for something other than the same old chain restraunts or pubs.

name: Cathy Daniels
text: This place always have good food. I went there to hear Symone French sing!

name: Edward Parsons
text: It's good. Burgers are top ten in the world for anyone's favorite list.

name: Reza Sadeghian
text: The best burger in Lower Alabama. Try the cucumber salad or chips and of course the bread pudding.

name: Schuyler Powell
text: Food was wonderful,one best burgers ever ate. The live music was amazing! The customers service was fast and surprisingly the bartender was really good at taking orders with the loud music playing I was really impressed with her attention to detail with everything that was going on.

name: Tara Busby
text: Great neighborhood bar! Great food and drinks. Always good music and a great time! For St. Patrick’s Day, it is definitely the place to be!

name: Billy McLeod
text: The company was better than the anything else.

name: Shayla Dalgliesh
text: The food here as about as perfect as it gets. Try the Reuben.

name: Quintavia Smith
text: Horrible experience! Our server was extremely rude and treated us with no respect my sister wasn’t feeling well so we had to leave we weren’t even there 5 minutes literally and she threaten to call the police on us if we didn’t pay for food that we didn’t even receive yet making a scene in front of all the customers which was a complete embarrassment and yells don’t ever come back again. I’m still in disbelief that this happen.

name: Susan Peele
text: Open and not crowded. Servers wearing masks.

name: Shannon Mcbride
text: Had the bbq shrimp po-boy grilled was amazing. Big sandwich for a Great price! Good list of drinks to order.

name: tipimaven
text: We had lunch here on a Tuesday. We loved the history of the place which was established in 1946. They have quite a few "Best Of" awards. We went for the best burger and loved it! We ordered the bacon cheese burger and it was almost too big to finish. We also ordered the house salad with smoked tuna salad. It was delicious and a great combination with the greens. The Guinness was a proper pour and they also make a nice Cosmo! Cheryl was our server / bartender and pretty much the entire front of house. She made us feel welcome and although we are just passing through it felt like our neighborhood bar. We will definitely put Callaghans on a list of places to visit again!

name: Chris M
text: Awesome burgers 👍

name: Melissa Davis
text: We had a blast! The live band was fantastic! I wish I got their name. They reminded me of Fleetwood Max. We had the grilled shrimp Poboy, Cole slaw, chips, and Spinach dip for the appetizer. The waitress was fantastic! She stayed checking on us and replacing our drinks. Friend neighborhood pub. Nice patrons and pet friendly. Can't wait to go back!💖💖💖💖

name: Cassandra Prime
text:
My friend comes to Mobile for work several times a year so I decided to make the trip to visit him for the weekend. All I've heard about for 2 months before coming here is about the burgers at Callaghan's and how amazing they are and it's his tradition to eat there as soon as he arrives in Mobile.

The location was great. To get there you drive through local streets with homes not stores. It was tucked nicely into a neighborhood. That gave it a nice authentic neighborhood bar(/family restaurant*) feel.

We went for lunch around 11:15 and I expected to be one of the first tables to sit since they open at 11:00. Nope! When we walked in they already had a steady flow of patrons coming in and full tables.

But getting down to business and what you really need to know:

**THE BURGERS WERE AMAZING!**

I let my friend guide me as to what I should get. It was very simple though, he said order the bacon cheese burger with everything and pick your cheese. I got it with cheddar. And I have to say I was hesitant about having mustard on the burger but i took his advice and it was so perfect. It blended the flavors so well. There was so much flavor, and I don't mean seasoning, I mean, my first bite and every one after was such a mouth watering burst of juicy burger goodness.  My friend also had the chicken club which he recommends as well. And their sweet tea was great, just the right amount of sweet with plenty of tea flavor.

The burgers do not come with Fries but you have options for a few items. I tried the coleslaw, I personally like a creamier coleslaw but their's was still very good.

I absolutely will be returning for another burger before I leave.

name: Sean Murray
text: First time going, pretty good atmosphere, decent beer deals, live music. Place was packed, little but of an older crowd at least when I went. Great place to have a relaxed night out.

name: Swain McSwain
text: Great burgers!! Pretty quaint restaurant in the neighborhood.

name: Ricky Rice
text: Always great service and best burger in the world

name: Mike Fletcher
text: The live music was great. Service was quick at the bar. Food is always good here.

name: Jennifer L
text:
The lady who appeared to be the server walked past us four times and only took orders from two guys who I think were making deliveries. We left the restaurant after several minutes of being approached by no one.
We gave this place another chance the following day, and they do have very good burgers.

name: Danny Bolton
text: Great food, friendly service, and amazing atmosphere!!

name: Glen Huey
text: LA Burger is the kind of thing Jesus is trying to warn us about.  One of the most amazing grown up burgers on the planet.  Everyone knows the fantastic atmosphere already.  Can get loud on live music night but the music is usually better than the conversation anyway.

name: david bozeman
text: Awesome place! great food! Excellent service

name: Ross Cobb
text: Without a doubt best burgers in town! Awesome spot as well with covered outside seating!

name: Myra Mason
text: This place is always delicious! Super awesome staff! They always make you feel welcome! Food and drinks are great!

name: John Cork
text: LA burger on Thursdays are out of this world. Great place. I can't wait for saint Patrick's day!

name: Brittany Brashaw
text: Absolutely love the atmosphere of this place, has a really cool pub feel. It's location is good for taking a short walk after your meal as well which is a plus. The food was great and so was the service. Definitely recommend!

name: Lindsey Hendrickson
text: Good food and fast service

name: Michael Davis
text: Service we friendly. We visited for the first time for a late lunch and did not realize the menu was limited. Everything else was fine and fun. Just did not know this was more bar and less restaurant.

name: Susan Benton (30A EATS)
text: Great cheeseburger and patio dining!

name: Airanita Faust
text: Love this hidden gem in Mobile!! Food and waitress  were great. Her custom made watermelon margarita was the bomb!!

name: Eric Hansen
text: One of my favorite places in Mobile, don't skip the LA burger!

name: tcroshon70
text: Great atmosphere and great burgers.

name: Jamie Blake
text: Nice place, friendly staff, good music. A staple of life and culture in this area. Food was basic pub fare, but everything was delicious and cooked to order. It does get busy during prime dinner hours, and it’s kind of a free-for-all when it comes to seating, but in my opinion it’s worth it! If you want to avoid the wait come early or you can always do a take-out-order: there’s a grassy area across from the restaurant that’s perfect for picnics! I didn’t come for any of the musical performances, but sees like there’s love music a few days a week.

name: Renee G
text: The best local Irish pub, hands down, my favorite place!!

name: Alvin Nelson
text: Best burger in Mobile. Hands down.

name: Kim Armstrong Montgomery
text: Super fun, laid-back place to get a sandwich and a drink and watch a ballgame. My burger was as big as my head. Great value. Husband had grilled shrimp poboy. Very generous portions. He didn't even notice that I snuck a few shrimp, which were very good. Great dive bar! Loved it!

name: Pamela Waleri
text: Great burgers & sandwiches. Best place to be on a Saturday afternoon or anytime. They have good music during the week.

name: Andrea Dickey
text: I got the philly cheesesteak.  It had good flavor, but that was the driest philly I have ever had. Not very impressed. It was ok.

name: David “salamander.” Bencomo
text: LA burger is amazing only on Wednesday's tho

name: Rusty Shackleford
text: This is the kind of place you want to watch a band. Q Close and intimate. They have great servers as well. Polite and remember your name. Just an overall well run place!

name: Matt Cobb
text:
This is a great bar and restaurant. It's a great place to hang out with friends and talk or catch a live band. The staff has always been excellent.

They have an amazing hamburger that's on the same level as Butch Cassidy's. The only thing I don't really care for is that they don't have hot sides, but that's no reason to skip Callaghan's.

They also have the best St. Patrick's Day party in Mobile.

name: Tim Camp
text: No other place like it in the world.

name: Jessica Fawcett
text:
Great! beer was good. Food was delicious, hand pattied burgers, cooked just how I like them.  Medium, which down here is medwell.  So I'm grateful for that.  Quite, slower evening.  Staff was fantastic
, polite and kind for me being picky.  Highly suggest!

name: Sean Varney
text: The LA Burger was outstanding!

name: scott zephries
text: This place is a must go to when your in Mobile! It's a great dive that's in a neighborhood that's close enough to downtown but far enough away. It's a small menu so they get every item right. I can recommend the Ruben, French dip and burgers. The service it's friendly and it's a fun place to go that has live music from a solo to a full band so check out the website so you go when the atmosphere is right for you but I loved them both!

name: Sound Buryer Music
text: Had a great time performing here after a long absence

name: Nik Martin
text: Great burger. Good service. If you come to eat the day a band is playing, there will only be a few tables inside available, so know the schedule before heading there.

name: Bert Carraway
text: One of the best burgers I've had in a while.

name: Jessi Lucero
text: The atmosphere was only topped by the very best burger that I have ever eaten in my entire life. A laid back and casual place that made you feel like you were instantly w9th friends. Fantastic, will definitely be back when I visit Mobile next.

name: mike dombroski
text: Great burger. Awesome atmosphere.  And the staff is the bee's knees.

name: Stephen S.
text: Nestled in a quaint midtown neighborhood Callaghans is a premium spot to catch a pint, a bite and great music. Super friendly staff and surprisingly good grub make this a hidden gem. Rustic and dingy in all the best ways it's the perfect place to whittle away an evening among friends and family.

name: Stacy Murphy
text: It has a nice atmosphere, and the chips and dip are good, but my grilled shrimp poboy was too salty. I would suggest getting some kind of burger, since I hear they are the best in town.

name: Bill Roberts
text: Always great music in here. It gets busy so come early or late. Check the hours to make sure they are open.

name: Marc Waddell
text: Food was super slow and super salty.  Sides were very good.  It had some live music entertainment which was excellent.  Probably would not go back though.

name: Taylor Bacon
text: Such a cool place. We saw a Jordy Searcy concert here. Because there isn't a stage it really allows you to connect with the artist. Drinks were good, bartenders were nice, and they didn't overpack the place. Great experience!

name: Marie Vinson
text: Good burger , better po boy , wish i had fries

name: Casey Albert
text: I love Callahan's. It's a little crowded for lunch on Fridays but well worth the wait

name: Martin Richer
text: Best burger in town. Small place and surprising taste!

name: Bill Roberts
text: Always great music in here. It gets busy so come early or late. Check the hours to make sure they are open.

name: Rich Oehmke
text: Great food, the service was fantastic. Extremely friendly  and personable. Ate there 2 days in a row.  Best iced tea I've ever had by far !!!

name: Sound Buryer Music
text: Had a great time performing here after a long absence

name: Jordan
text: Wonderful neighborhood place. Callaghan’s is one of the best small venues for live music in Mobile. Award winning burgers, great staff, and a wonderful vibe that is unmatched. If you are from out of town, this is the place to get a taste of real Mobile culture. Do not miss this classic!

name: Taylor Bacon
text: Such a cool place. We saw a Jordy Searcy concert here. Because there isn't a stage it really allows you to connect with the artist. Drinks were good, bartenders were nice, and they didn't overpack the place. Great experience!

name: Nik Martin
text: Great burger. Good service. If you come to eat the day a band is playing, there will only be a few tables inside available, so know the schedule before heading there.

name: mike dombroski
text: Great burger. Awesome atmosphere.  And the staff is the bee's knees.

name: Stacy Murphy
text: It has a nice atmosphere, and the chips and dip are good, but my grilled shrimp poboy was too salty. I would suggest getting some kind of burger, since I hear they are the best in town.

name: Casey Albert
text: I love Callahan's. It's a little crowded for lunch on Fridays but well worth the wait

name: Trevor Fisher
text: Fantastic burger, great music

name: Hannah S
text: Great local dive bar/restaurant, Irish inspired food and decor. Historic location. Good service. Locals place as well as a place anyone out of town should visit. Try an Irish car bomb ;)

name: Susan McGinnis
text: Love Callaghans,  The people are nice and the foods great!!!

name: Matt Rowland
text: Maybe the best bar in the country. A simple family Irish pub in a neighborhood that has exquisite taste in booking Americana bands. The food is simple but delicious. The Guinness is clean.

name: phillip zangas
text: French dip and French onion dip....off the chain!

name: Elizabeth Borrow
text: Great food! I got the Philly and it was bigger than I expected. The chips are kettle style cooked, which I think are delicious. Drinks are good. I got more than I expected with the double jack and coke (less coke more jack for sure). Definitely recommend going here!

name: Mark Harrison
text: You can't go wrong visiting this traditional Irish neighborhood pub. A must for anyone traveling to or through Mobile.

name: Josiah Leonard
text: Friendly crowd, good music, good beer selection, great food, and a cool atmosphere.

name: Joey Unanimous
text:
Was told about this place by a local barber, after eating their burger I would have to say I highly recommend this place! Sure it's a bar in a residential area, and it gets packed and smells like beer, but the burgers are amazing!

I would go again!

name: J Koontz
text: It's okay. If you're just looking for beer and burgers then it's great. But if you're hoping for more of an Irish flair, I sure didn't find it here. More like an American neighborhood bar.

name: Heath Whittington
text: For atmosphere I give a 5. For service I give a 5. Staff did a great job. Great place for a date night or with the guys. Food was average. Nothing on the menu would make me want to go here just for the food.

name: Joshua Verdon
text: Great place! Best burgers, actually best meal I had in Mobile.

name: Matt Irvin
text: Awesome atmosphere, great food. They lose a star for up-charging credit card users.

name: Carl Cronin
text: Great food good atmosphere

name: Art Lopez
text: Great burgers.  I'd say the best in the city of Mobile.  The Cole slaw used to be good. Not too good anymore.

name: Bill Donaldson
text: Mobile's best and most consistent burgers.

name: Jason Strickland
text: Really good burger and po' boy and decent beer selection.

name: jacqueline jackson
text: neighborhood bar and restaurant with a down home feel. Had the shrimp po' boy (blackened) with cole slaw on the side, and it was pretty decent. Service was good for having only one waitress especially since it's walk in and seat yourself. If you would like to  go somewhere with a homey vibe and friendly service in an active neighborhood? This is the place.

name: Patrick Plash
text: Cool little spot! Great burger.

name: T Parson
text: Mmmmm, the LA Burger is really good.

name: Dick Whiting
text:
This might be one of the best neighborhood bars in North America! Locals know this, but if you're from out of town, make your way to this little enclave in the Garden District. Known for their cheeseburgers, all their offerings are first rate. No, they don't have fries, but they have sides that will make just about anyone happy. The beer selection is great too!
The music though! This is one of the best intimate venues to hear live music on the coast! The singer/songwriter series always brings well-known and up and coming acts through town. They recognize local artists, and showcase the best. Sunday nights are my favorite, but any time of day or night, Callaghan's hits the spot.

name: Myra Wallace
text: I love this place         music food.   fun.

name: william gibson
text: Best burger I've ever had

name: Susan Peele
text: Awesome burgers and live music. Pet friendly.

name: Tony Plosczynski
text: Nothing to not love about Callahan's! Best burger in the area and live music all the time.

name: Shari Childress
text: Great service, awesome decore, wonderful bands and amazing food!

name: Derek Gillian
text: Seriously one of the best burgers I've ever had philly was also delicious. Eat here or dont but you are missing out

name: Dominic Florio
text: Fun place to gang out, eat an excellent burger and listen to good music.🍺🍀🍀🍀👍✌

name: Mandrella Shepherd Salgado
text: Callaghan Irish Pub is a fun place to hang out with friends. The staff is top notch and the owner is great. Visitors or you live here make sure you add it to your list as a place to go.

name: Leslie Albert
text: Blackened shrimp poboy is unparalleled thus far.

name: Robert Gibson
text: Cool place. Courtyard seating. Good for sports. Good for live music. Good pub grub.

name: Kimberly Lombardi
text: Always great weather was fantastic and roll tide.

name: Josie Tyrer
text: Satisfying burgers and friendly people. Cheryl makes it feel like home! I haven't seen a live show there yet, but its definitely on my list!

name: Megan Kinsey
text: Once again, I'm eating at Callahan's. My husband brought me an L.A. burger and it's to die for!!! I recommend this place to everyone I know and even those I don't know! Keep up the great work!! Love this place! Everything you get from there is AMAZING!

name: Joshua Wafer
text: Food was good. Service was good. However the AC was lacking.

name: Graham Jones
text: A perennial favorite!

name: Juan Hernandez
text: wonderful food!!  great draught beers and good friendly service.

name: Kat Gosselin
text: Limited pub menu but amazing beer list. Great atmosphere! Dog friendly! Right in the middle of a neighborhood!

name: Kaki Hanenkrat
text: As always, the food is out of this world. The service from Cheryl, Lizzie and Bruce is top notch. It feels like home with family and I love it!

name: Lisa Peacock
text: The food was very good I enjoyed myself

name: Dustin Denney
text: Amazing food and fun atmosphere!

name: Dean Williams
text: Just the best.

name: jeremy esterly
text: Easy to see why it was voted the best bar in the South by Garden and Gun Magazine. Great food and beer selection!

name: Hannah Schiller
text: Crowded but buoyant, bustling and happy. Staff were attentive even though there were so many people. They seemed to actually be having a good time which really put good energy into the place. Good about checking IDs. Lots of seating but sometimes, as I said, v busy. Historic spot and close to parades (at least route A went by just a block or two away). Food was great, but I was drunk when I ate there, so all u can vouch for is the great drunk food. On the greasy side, a lil salad. Glad they serve so late! And I will def be ordering that amazing artichoke dip next time.

name: Angela Cardo
text: We're from Chicago and love a great burger...this was a Great burger- Very filling and good potato salad too!  So relaxing and friendly neighborhood place...highly worth the outta the way hike.

name: Cynthia Streit
text: Awesome.   Has the feel of old Austin, TX and Key West, FL.

name: Ryan Beverly
text: Best Burger you can get is what this place is known for. That and it's big block party on St. Paddy's day. The atmosphere is great and the food and drink spot on. Many of locals come here, it also gives it a rustic feeling that it's located in a neighborhood. The live music makes it another must to go to.

name: Lisa Watkins
text: Food and service were both good. Quaint local eatery with live music.

name: Channing Morris
text: Neat place. Kinda small, but the burger is tasty.

name: Paul Underdown
text: Great burger, service and atmosphere!! A Mobile classic!

name: Roy Hollie
text: Consistency.  Every time I eat there, the food is always perfect.

name: N H
text: This places just consistently has the best burgers and service! Mom and I split a burger and each got our own side. Busy Friday, first night of Marf Gras and our food was still out hot, fast and perfect!

name: Brian Wright
text: Great atmosphere and hands-down the best burger in town. Don't let anyone fool you. They also have a great variety of musicians play as they pass through. Just a great neighborhood bar.

name: Brian Graves
text: Great food really good atmosphere excellent prices...

name: Natalie Fay Smith
text: Always a good time with a fun loving staff, delicious food and foot stompin' beats!  A must.  On my way for a blackened shrimp poboy!

name: Joel Fuller
text: Love this place. Great neighborhood bar and best burgers around. Local legend and it lives up to it's reputation. If you're in town or want to try a Mobile original go to Callaghan's. You will be pleased!

name: Total Building
text: Took forever to get our food, almost an hour, but the wait is more than worth it!!!  Great reuben, cheese burger and out of this world potato salad.  Staff very friendly.

name: Valerie Burnes
text: Our favorite place in Mobile.  We stop in every time we pass through. It has great atmosphere and we love to take a stroll around the neighborhood when we are done.

name: christopher marshall
text: Great place a lil too Caucasian though never my people of color

name: Marsha Davis
text: Reuben was excellent.  Potato salad too dry had large pieces of potatoes.

name: Adrienne Tate
text: Great burger...live the music was very good. Service was great as well.

name: Sarah Smith
text: Callaghan's never disappoints! Great service, food, and live music!

name: Chris Buechler
text: Great Burger, good beer, good bread pudding, nice service.  Recommend for a simple burger and beer with interesting atmosphere.

name: Roger Pettis
text: Great pub fare music's venue with lots of history. Right in the middle of the Oakleigh District, a quaint neighborhood, seconds from downtown. Always have a good time here and it is the place to be on St. Patty's day!

name: Elaine Hyland
text: Awesome burger! Delicious potato salad! Great music and atmosphere in a quaint old Mobile neighborhood.

name: Juan Diaz
text: Not sure why this place has such a great review. It's an OK place, but not great. Would I go back? If I'm in the area, I would probably consider it, bit better options are available. Burgers were good, but not great; not much variety. The Philly Cheese was OK, but not good; it had an OK taste and it was big, but the meat was not shredded as it should be. Not a large selection of draft beers. Service? It was OK, but not great. Atmosphere and decor? Better options are available in the area. Price was right.

name: Randy Brown
text: Great music wonderful food people that work here are great

name: Justin Massimo
text: One of the best bars I've ever been to definitely worth a few visits!!!

name: Charles Steeg
text: One of a kind destination bar located in the heart of Oakleigh Garden District that grew to become an Irish area of the neighborhood due to the potato famine in Ireland that caused mass immigration.   This bar is a local favorite for the great food and live music. This small corner Irish bar nestled into the middle of a neighborhood has become the launching pad for many well known national artists and bands.

name: Johnny Collins
text: Great food great people must have

name: Brussels
text: Was not helpful in finding my true love

name: Andrew Smith
text: Best burger in Mobile

name: Meg Tarpey
text: Best bar in Mobile, no contest. Amazing burgers and live music!

name: Joshua Whiteside
text: Me and my girlfriend had lunch here today. We had two cheese steaks with chips and some Irish coffee to drink. The Irish coffee tasted like it had way too much whiskey in it and wasn't drinkable. The waitress replaced it, and the replacement drink was better, but still wasn't that good. The cheese steak was mediocre at best. With tip I spent $40.00 for us to eat and have one drink that niether of us where able to finish. Maybe what I ordered isn't their specialty, but judging by my first experience I doubt I will be going back.

name: Ashley Black
text: Friendly service and good beer selection

name: Nate Wilson
text: Great atmosphere, SUPER good food.

name: David Brown
text: Killer burger. Just a small hole in the wall on the corner. Felt sorry for the one waitress on duty. She was also working the bar. Did a great job!!

name: bradley thompson
text: Good music and great food

name: edward ramirez
text: Nice place to enjoy a decent lunch. Not too crowded during lunch.

name: Joe Carrizales
text: Only reason I'm giving Callaghan's three star was because the service was mighty slow when I was there around noon on a Sunday. The burger was fantastic but took me about 40 to 45 minutes to get it from the time I ordered it. Not sure when. The non-busy times are.

name: Jackie Kearney
text: We truly love Callaghan's.  It is a great place to go for wonderful, reasonably priced food in a relaxed atmosphere.  There is lots of history in the facility and super associates who work there.

name: Wendy James
text: Friendly neighborhood, dog friendly bar. Whether for a quick bit or a more relaxed stay, you will love Callaghans.

name: Robert
text: Really good food and service. They are more of a pub that happens to serve food rather than a restaraunt that act like a pub. Had a live band when we were there and had a 5 dollar cover for it. But they had seating in the back if you were only there to eat and didnt want to see the band. Only reason its not 5 stars is climate control is determined by the climate its self. Had doors open on a cold night which caught me off guard. But other than that I will be back.

name: Mark Coleman
text: Its Callahan's, what do you expect. It's always good

name: Molly Cronin
text: This place is really homey. Awesome neighborhood place for a low key burger and beer and a relaxing time. Bring your dog, sit outside, and just enjoy life!

name: Nick Hayes
text: Great neighborhood bar in Mobile.  Can't beat ambiance and environment.

name: Dana Sprinkle
text: Love, love, love CALLAGHANS!!! The staff is FIRST CLASS and BEST MUSIC and FOOD AROUND!!!! Here today CELEBRATING OUR ANNIVERSARY WE MET HERE 3 YEARS AGO TODAY agnes and it's a MOST BEAUTIFUL MOBILE DAY !!!

name: xander eynon
text: What can I say about this place that Southern Living hasn't already said? There's simply no place like it in the world.  Grateful to have Callaghans in my city and in my life.

name: Pat O'Brien
text: One of the best burgers you can buy in an amazing location in a historic neighborhood. Be there on St. Patrick's Day for a blast. The music at night is always great as well.

name: Joel Minto
text: Best burger in town. Oh wait best burger in the state.. In the top 150 bars in the United States. Great staff, great food, and great bands....

name: John Green
text:
An awesome experience. If this were in my community, it would be where you would find me.
Love it

name: Shirley Olson
text: Nice atmosphere, dog friendly and great beer!

name: Chris Gillig
text: What a spectacular place!  I'm sure the place will be rocking on March 17th.  Hope I can make it back soon.

name: Stephanie Melton
text: Best Irish pub in Mobile! Where the locals go!

name: Jeremy Martin
text: The burger was not as good as peole make it out to be. Not sure how Esquire Magazine thought so highly of it. Music was great.

name: john hamilton
text: If you are in Mobile and don't eat a cheeseburger at callahans you are missing out. Or go hear some great live music

name: Timothy Briley
text: Phil & Foster every Wednesday night!

name: Holly Lanther
text: Good burgers, good drink prices and good service.

name: Danielle Sommer
text: Best hamburger ever! Great staff and service!

name: Matthew Van Duyn
text: Best cheeseburger I've ever had, period.

name: Sharon Mayo
text: Hubby enjoyed it. I was just ok with it.

name: Ben Brenner
text: They have the a delicious bacon cheese burger (around $9) and the Irish Dip is great too.  Guinness and Fairhope on tap .  The atmosphere nice.  So much going on.  The tables outside are fun. They have a great selection of live music throughout the week.

name: Logan Wolf
text: Awesome old pub with lots of history

name: Karla Triplett
text: Nice old pub in an historical area.  Great atmosphere and very friendly staff.

name: Garrett Frech
text: Ignore the fact that it made best bar in the south, or that it's easily the best place to hangout for St Patty's days. You can also skip all the live entertainment and wonderful selection of beers on tap. This place is 5 stars for 3 words: conecuh sausage burger.

name: CreamintheCoffee
text: For some reason this place escaped my notice I am ashamed to admit! In Mobile this place is an Irish Mecca -- the Holy Gaelic Grail! The atmosphere reeks of fun and the food is top notch too! My new watering hole!

name: L S-L
text: Great hamburgers and nice staff. Horrible live music tonight but some other nights it's not so bad

name: Meg Johnson
text: Best burger you will eat, great live music, fantastic staff, fun atmosphere!

name: Tim Campbell
text: Great atmosphere plus the best live music in the southeast and the burgers!!!!

name: Jake Martin
text: Great people. Great food. Great music.

name: David Calametti
text: Great live music venue and the best burgers!

name: john bosley
text:
Very nice part of our trip across the USA
MAGA!

name: Jim Bateman
text: I saw 'Paw Paw's Medicine Cabinet' there sometime ago with my friend Selwyn Miller.  Not only was the band great, but the club afforded the perfect opportunity to experience their music in an intimate setting!!!

name: Gayle Alexander
text: Best burgers, intimate venue for live music

name: Bill Mcnallie
text: Fabulous food, beer, & music. A must visit

name: Richard Hawley
text: Best tasting Burger in town!

name: Helen Nixon
text: Great St.  Patrick's Day celebration! We had a great time !

name: Bruce Bowman
text: Great food and service

name: Greg McDonald
text: Great sandwiches/burgers..but...skimpy sides and $$$

name: Tony Findley
text: Invited by a friend to have lunch,first time I've been to Callahan's,the cheese burger was great...already making plans to go again...

name: Maggie McNab
text: Burger was so delicious

name: Derek A
text: Great food and atmosphere but why is it ok for bars to be so dirty. We went for lunch. The wall by my table looked like it hasn't been wiped off in 10 years.

name: Mandy Bishop
text: Love this place!! Best burger in Mobile. Hand down. Don't debate me on this. I will not budge. Ha.

name: Michelle Byrd
text: Ok place for a quick bite. Don't expect too much from the server's.

name: Billy J
text: A hidden gem in the oakleigh district. Known for their live music and amazing burgers. Super relaxed and casual atmosphere. A must for everyone.

name: Candise Carter
text: Fun atmosphere, great food, friendly staff. The grilled shrimp poboys are amazing. The onion dip and chips is a must!

name: Tobias Gross
text: Good burger but a bit noisy place

name: Ivan E. Sanabria
text: Great bar, Great burgers, friendly staff

name: Rick Farrar
text:
Great food, the drinks flow, and the outside seating is a great addition. Kitschy and cozy, we came here on recommendation from family. Great beer selection gains extra points.

.. And being the first stop down south for myself, it was a perfect place to get some southern hospitality!

name: Mama Hall's Kitchen
text: Great service.  Delicious food.  Fun place to eat or catch a great band.

name: Sofia Kulakowski
text: Awesome food in an lovely quaint atmosphere.  Perfect for family time or date night!!!

name: Randy Schneiter
text: Excellent food, first time dining here. Would definitely come back.

name: David Worrell
text: Nice neighborhood bar. Good beer selection and decent bar food.

name: Holly Ha†cher
text: The food was amazing I'm not so sure about that wait time though. @modelmade5 on IG

name: Brian Logan
text: Awesome food and service!

name: Ted Egge
text: Great Burgers... The Bread Pudding is a must !

name: Laurie Watson McKay
text: BEST BACON CHEESEBURGER IN MOBILE. Hands down! Great beer as well. Definitely don't miss this place with live music!

name: Aimee Anderson
text: Great experience, as always. I usually get the world famous hamburger, but today got the chicken Philly steak. It may be world-famous one day as well. The service was amazing today, especially considering it was Mardi Gras day.

name: Brittany Roybal
text:
I went there for my 26th birthday because I've never been.  Had good food (starter & meal), drinks, and even music.  Music wasn't too loud just right.  Also, I didn't notice anyone smoking inside, a definite plus. Parking is along the streets in the neighborhood which is not a positive nor negative.
Menu is simple but great food!
Overall, I can't believe I waited so long to check this place out.

name: Elizabeth Gazzier
text: I really enjoyed the live music an atmosphere the bathroom was a little dirty but other than that it was a nice place

name: Susan McKenna
text: The best bar in Mobile.  A great fun loving crowd,  and the best live music anywhere!

name: Brian Phelan
text: This is a friendly fun Irish pub with fantastic staff, music and customers. The menu is good but very basic.

name: PathManUK
text: Delicious burgers, good music and a great craic!

name: Mike Baucom
text: The best bar in Mobile, if not Alabama or the USA. Great music, atmosphere, and an outstanding burger. Eclectic crowd changes as the evening progresses.

name: Sugar Skull Wolf
text: Small friendly atmosphere. If you're looking for a good neighborhood restaurant this is the place.

name: Sophia Turner
text: Cute little bar that always has good music playing!

name: Ray Weinshenker
text: Always a fabulous time!

name: Aaron Bonds
text:
Great burgers and Irish dips (add bacon!)
Nice outside seating as well

name: Jordan Vallas
text: Iconic. One of the best joints and mobile and one of the best burgers. I take all my out of town friends here first for a cold pint and some food.

name: Rich Malasics
text: Hamburger was great. Little long of a wait for food but understandable since this place was packed for lunch.

name: Philip Yeakel
text: Meh bartender... atmosphere typical Irish bar atmosphere... bartender too concerned with regulars to take care of a new customer. Won't be back.

name: Mary Alice Connor
text: This is the best place in the whole wide world!! 🤘🏼

name: Daphne Wood
text: Love the atmosphere and people are great. Food is always amazing.

name: Elie K
text: Good local place with food from Louisiana and craft beers

name: Jason Lykins
text: Great place for lunch!

name: Joseph G Moses
text: The LA Burger is a great tasting burger and strongly recommend.

name: Misha Patel
text: Their food is incredible I mean their menu is small but so great!!

name: Back To My ROOTS
text: My favorite place for a cheeseburger and beer in the South. Great bands and atmosphere. I would put their burger up against anyone's.

name: GreatMagnetRecording Concerns
text: Truly great burgers, and some damn fine folks to boot.

name: Brian Nelson
text: Great food and great service ❤❤

name: Daphne Smith Wood
text: Best grilled chicken salad I've ever had. Love the atmosphere.

name: Joseph G Moses
text: The LA Burger is a great tasting burger and strongly recommend.

name: GreatMagnetRecording Concerns
text: Truly great burgers, and some damn fine folks to boot.

name: PathManUK
text: Delicious burgers, good music and a great craic!

name: garnerdaniel56
text: I have heard about this place and the LA burger for almost a year and I finally tries it today and I was not a let down. Great service and the staff was very friendly.

name: Alex Lackner
text: Longtime local took us for shrimp po-boys! Awesome.

name: Heather Higgins
text: What fun!  And the burgers are amazing....

name: Olga Sayer
text: Excellent place to eat with friends, have a drink and enjoy live music.

name: Brian Logan
text: Awesome food and service!

name: Tom Deane
text: Great burgers and well guarded.  There were local officers there throughout our visit

name: MITCH CROSS
text: This place is indescribable,everything is great here,I 've had every sandwich and the burger,you can't go wrong with any choice

name: Michael Welch
text: Been drinking there for years

name: Kevin Jackson
text:
I usually don't give reviews, especially negative ones, but the server was extremely short, rude, and hardly waited for us to answer when she asked, "do you need anything?"

I accidentally forgot to ask for no ketchup or mustard on my burger. It was a huge hassle to get it fixed, and when I got a new burger, they clearly just scraped the mayonnaise off instead of making a new burger. Also, I asked for medium rare and it was well done.

name: Jakiyah Kyles
text: Small spot with great food! 10/10 recommendation!

name: Chance Cooper
text: Excellent food as always. Great beer. Great friends. Great time.

name: Sidney Seale
text: Mobile tradition and a damned good one.

name: MITCH CROSS
text: This place is indescribable,everything is great here,I 've had every sandwich and the burger,you can't go wrong with any choice

name: Msfridercoachsherrie Sherrie Paradise
text: Very cool bar and restaurant

name: Heather Higgins
text: What fun!  And the burgers are amazing....

name: garnerdaniel56
text: I have heard about this place and the LA burger for almost a year and I finally tries it today and I was not a let down. Great service and the staff was very friendly.

name: Scott Reid
text: Cool casual neighborhood pub. Just stopped in for a beer but I hear the food is good too!

name: Jordan Vallas
text: Iconic. One of the best joints and mobile and one of the best burgers. I take all my out of town friends here first for a cold pint and some food.

name: Sean O'Neill
text:
Review of burgers:

Pros = mesayy, cheesy, greasy,, cloths staining, meaty, great griddle crust

Cons = None

name: Mary Alice Connor
text: This is the best place in the whole wide world!! 🤘🏼

name: Shane Duke
text: Amazing food, great service, and as always, cant beat the music!

name: Msfridercoachsherrie Sherrie Paradise
text: Very cool bar and restaurant

name: Warren McCrory
text: Never a bad time here. The burgers are top notch.

name: Sanford G
text: Oldest pub in Mobile, great atmosphere, amd fantastic food. Best burger in Mobile

name: Joe Hudson
text: One of the best reasons to live in the Oakleigh Garden District, THE best burger in Mobile and THE best atmosphere.

name: Caitlin Donovan
text: Great burger, great service, great atmosphere. A definite favorite!

name: Jerry Persons
text: Great food, great service, great band, even watched the international space station fly over that night , thanks to the band lead singer informing everyone of the event....

name: Monica Raybon
text: Nice place, good food and ambiance

name: Caitlin Donovan
text: Great burger, great service, great atmosphere. A definite favorite!

name: K. Allen Foster
text: Always a treat to stop here for a pint or two and the BEST burger in Mobile. Great neighborhood atmosphere!

name: Pete Preston
text: Best burger in Bama!

name: Joe Hudson
text: One of the best reasons to live in the Oakleigh Garden District, THE best burger in Mobile and THE best atmosphere.

name: Tom Parcell
text: Awesome burgers, great people and servers with attitude!

name: Jeremy Brumbalow
text: What a hidden gym, can’t wait to go back and visit this place again, wonderful atmosphere and full of history, good beer selection and live music, and great chicken philly!

name: Scott Jones
text: Nice joint.  I'ma go again

name: JM
text: Good burger

name: Daniel Thompson
text: This is the literal "hole in the wall" place. It's loud and fun and has great burgers.

name: Warren McCrory
text: Never a bad time here. The burgers are top notch.

name: Chip Henderson
text: Really cool pub atmosphere! The French onion dip is amazing!

name: Devin Talley
text: Small, cramped, loud. Food was okay and staff is all right but definitely won't be going back. More of a bar atmosphere than a restaurant or Social Club.

name: Gary Donaldson
text: Great music and comfortable atmosphere

name: Austin Hopkins
text: Just an all out blah!  Food is boring and just average.   I had the bbq bacon burger special and tasted 0 bbq.    The only thing this place has going for it is the old vintage building.

name: S D
text: Best bacon cheeseburger in town! Get it with cheddar cheese.

name: Timothy Dennis
text: Great place for great food and awesome place for hearing up and coming artist and great local musicians!

name: Janis Friedlander
text: Best hamburgers in town.

name: lyle coleman
text: Good atmosphere and good burger.  Wish they had fries

name: RONNIE ROGERS
text: Great little pub...excellent food...location not the best.

name: Wayne Allen
text: I love there Ruben, the best place for a day or night out

name: Jennifer Cashman
text: Great burgers and shrimp poboys!

name: Brent Markwell
text:
Never in my 58 years have I tasted such perfection. Started with chips and French onion dip. Good gracious it was good. Don’t know for a fact, but  it all tasted homemade. After licking the last bits of dip out of the container, BZ brought the main course. I ordered a Rueben with a side of potato salad. How on God’s green earth did they get that kind of flavor in a Rueben. The smoke or char or whatever it was still makes me salivate just thinking about it. And the potato salad was the perfect sidekick.

My recommendation would be for you to run, not walk to Callaghan’s with the silent g. And ask for BZ. She was so chill and friendly.

name: Carol Reeves
text: Food was great, service fast and attentive, fun atmosphere.

name: S. Heike
text: Loved it there. Friendly people, great Music

name: Keri McMahon
text: Pretty good lil neighborhood spot,  shrimp po boy was yummy!

name: Lauren Moore
text: Amazing food, good bands play often and awesome service!!

name: Read Breeland
text: Great neighborhood Pub and Grub.   Fun of the ordinary chain if you like different.

name: David Stein
text: Good food good people great atmosphere

name: LAND HARRINGTON
text: Not as good as I remember from a few years ago.

name: Jeremy Brumbalow
text: What a hidden gym, can’t wait to go back and visit this place again, wonderful atmosphere and full of history, good beer selection and live music, and great chicken philly!

name: S. Heike
text: Loved it there. Friendly people, great Music

name: Phillip Howell
text: Always see what the daily special is , but a bacon cheeseburger with pepper jack cheese or the Reuben are the way to go. Nice outdoor seating and they have live music often.

name: Lauren Moore
text: Amazing food, good bands play often and awesome service!!

name: LAND HARRINGTON
text: Not as good as I remember from a few years ago.

name: Ryan Meisemann
text: This is the best place to grab a beer and a bite to eat in the city. Hands down the best burger in Mobile.

name: RONNIE ROGERS
text: Great little pub...excellent food...location not the best.

name: Joel Reimer (JWR1)
text: We enjoyed a nice evening with friends at the neighborhood watering hole. It is always a good time at Callaghan's Irish Social Club.

name: Matthew Rhodes
text: Always ask about the special of the day. If they have the cordon blue, get it. You won't regret it.

name: chris hughes
text: Always the best burger in town. Friendly service and great bands.

name: Julie Day
text: Nice to have a great place for good food and music in the neighborhood

name: Marilyn Wininger
text: Nothing fancy but a good place for a burger and a beer

name: Brent Markwell
text:
Never in my 58 years have I tasted such perfection. Started with chips and French onion dip. Good gracious it was good. Don’t know for a fact, but  it all tasted homemade. After licking the last bits of dip out of the container, BZ brought the main course. I ordered a Rueben with a side of potato salad. How on God’s green earth did they get that kind of flavor in a Rueben. The smoke or char or whatever it was still makes me salivate just thinking about it. And the potato salad was the perfect sidekick.

My recommendation would be for you to run, not walk to Callaghan’s with the silent g. And ask for BZ. She was so chill and friendly.

name: Paul Bacon (Bacon's Pub)
text: This is your neighborhood bar, good food, good selection of craft beer, often live music from local and regional musicians.

name: Ashley hayes
text: My first time great burgers. Services excellent

name: Matthew Rhodes
text: Always ask about the special of the day. If they have the cordon blue, get it. You won't regret it.

name: Janis Friedlander
text: Best hamburgers in town.

name: Jaye
text: Great place to meet friends... wonderful drinks

name: Robert Pippen
text: Great burgers

name: ben “Ben Da Cajun” hebert
text: Nice chill  place. Can bring dogs outside. Great music from time to time...super great bloody mary's

name: Chelsea Pirtle
text: Great place to visit. One of my favorite bars in Mobile

name: Florida Food Review
text: My first time visit there was on St Patrick's Day. Absolutely wonderful Vibe, great music. I will be back!

name: Courtney Williams
text: Good burgers, good music, good people.

name: Tara Elliott
text: Great place! This is an awesome place with ice cold beer! It was actually in slushie format...yummy!!! The atmosphere was at hime feel, people were friendly and polite.  Service was awesome never had an empty beer. The food although we didnt eat looked delicious and smelt great. Just unfortunate we found this on our last night in Mobile. If we return we will visit again!!!

name: Joe Black
text: This is a AWESOME Irish Pub.... The staff is very polite and atentive... All round wonderful place I recomend them to anyone I know..... Can't say enough about them.... Kudos...

name: William Smith
text: Great burger! We live an hour away and don't travel to Mobile that often but we will definitely be going back to Callaghan's the next time we are in town.

name: Trevor Fisher
text: Fantastic burger, great music

name: Chris Mccombs
text: One of the best burgers I've ever eaten!

name: Edward Oetken
text: Great local watering hole with the charm of an Irish Pub

name: Gregory Sanford
text: Decent food live music, a neighborhood tavern

name: Ray Slapkunas
text: Your local dive bar that offers typical bar food and burgers. Nothing special about the food or atmosphere. Band was decent and waitress was friendly.

name: Ricky Louis
text: Good bar food. Fun atmosphere.

name: Brandon Redd
text: LA burger and pasta salad

name: stritzi
text:
(Translated by Google) small pub with a nice atmosphere, with outdoor seating, some with live music. It was a great mood.

Good, juicy burgers (ask about the day special and maybe take that, was a good choice). Ingredients are waiting fresh.

Unfortunately, here too, as in many places: plastic cutlery ...

(Original)
kleines Pub mit schönem Ambiente, mit Aussensitzplätzen, teils mit Live-Musik. Es war eine tolle Stimmung.

Gute, saftige Burger (nach dem Tages-Special fragen und vielleicht doch das nehmen, war eine gute Wahl). Zutaten warten frisch.

Leider auch hier wie so an manchen Orten: Besteck aus Plastik...
